about_title: Hi, I am Thuc, a Web Developer.
about_description: Graduated from Cao Thang Technical College in 2022 majoring in Computer Network Administration. I'm a web developer (JavaScript, PHP, MySQL) with a focus on creating exceptional digital experiences that are fast, accessible, visually appealing, and responsive. I'm always looking for practical technology to improve my skills and daily life.
